author: IGN
description:
Hades II flips the formula established by the first game, and sees Melinoe travelling down to the underworld, rather than travelling up through it. However, right by the doorway out of the Crossroads is… another path. One that leads up. Traveling to the surface is an important part of the story in Hades II, but unlocking this alternate pathway is a process shrouded in obscurity, so we’re here to show you how to reach (and then survive) the surface in Hades 2.

00:00 - Intro
00:30 - How to Unlock The Surface
02:15 - Your First Surface Visit
02:45 - How to Survive The Surface
05:25 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming #Hades2
title: Hades 2 - How to Unlock (and Survive) The Surface

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from the newly enhanced Nintendo Switch 2 port of Super Mario Galaxy 2. Mario Galaxy 2 is half of the Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle that features 4k 60FPS on the Switch 2 as well as a ton of other features such as an improved UI, extra Storybook Chapters, and more. 

Gampleay captured on a Docked Nintendo Switch 2

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Super Mario Galaxy 2 - Enhanced Switch 2 Gameplay 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Following yesterday's bombshell news from Microsoft that Xbox Game Pass is getting a features and price overhaul, retailer GameStop has said via X that they will continue to sell one-month subscriptions to Game Pass Ultimate for the pre-hike price of $19.99. Other retailers such as Best Buy and Walmart continue to list subscriptions for that price, but have not yet publicly commented if they will follow Microsoft's MSRP for the service. In other news, developer Starbreeze has officially canceled its Dungeons & Dragons game, codenamed "Project Baxter," laid off some of its developers, and recommitted to its troubled Payday 3 and the "heist genre." And finally, Quentin Tarantino's martial arts western epic, Kill Bill, is returning to theaters as one four-hour film titled "Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair." Originally released in two volumes six months apart, the two halves have been slightly re-edited as one film as originally envisioned by Tarantino.

#IGN #Gami
title: GameStop Commits to Selling Game Pass Ultimate for $19.99 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from the newly enhanced Nintendo Switch 2 port of Super Mario Galaxy 1. Mario Galaxy 1 is half of the Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle that features 4k 60FPS on the Switch 2 as well as a ton of other features such as an improved UI, extra Storybook Chapters, and more. It's a definite improvement over the Wii version.

Gameplay captured on a Docked Nintendo Switch 2

#IGN #Gaming
title: Super Mario Galaxy 1 - Enhanced Switch 2 Gameplay 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
EA is going private in a $55 billion all-cash deal. The publisher behind FIFA, Madden, Battlefield, and The Sims has agreed to be acquired by a group including Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund (PIF), Silver Lake, and Affinity Partners. This marks the largest take-private deal in gaming history. In this video, we break down what this means for EA, its players, and the wider gaming industry.

#EA #Gaming #IGN
title: EA Just Went Private - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Ghost of Yotei builds on the foundation of Ghost of Tsushima’s combat system and makes it even more dynamic and challenging. But don’t be fooled -- Ezo’s battles can punish button mashers and unprepared samurai. That’s why we’ve put together 9 essential combat tips to help you master Atsu’s journey for revenge against the Yotei Six.

From learning when to use light vs. heavy attacks, understanding color-coded enemy strikes, and prioritizing weapon counters, to unlocking new tools, evolving your loadouts, and making the most of wolf companions, this guide covers everything you need to cut through your enemies with precision.
title: Ghost of Yotei: 9 Combat Tips to Master Samurai Fighting

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Developer Gameplay Commentary #2 for Mewgenics, a turn-based strategy roguelite RPG developed by Edmund McMillen and Tyler Glaiel. Players will be able to interact with over 6 classes with a suite of different abilities to defeat powerful bosses, acquire specific mutations, and survive it all to continue the feline bloodline in the process. Join Edmund McMillen for an extensive playthrough of Mewgenics, showcasing well over an hour of gameplay. Mewgenics is launching on February 10, 2026, for PC (Steam).
title: Mewgenics - Developer Gameplay Commentary #2

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The Evolution' Trailer for Tron: Ares, a sci-fi drama action film distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Take a look at the latest trailer that calls back to the legacy of Tron and sets up the Earth-shattering evolution of the franchise with Tron: Ares, releasing in theaters on October 10.

A highly sophisticated Program, Ares, is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission.

Tron: Ares stars Greta Lee, Sarah Desjardins, Gillian Anderson, Jared Leto, Evan Peters, Jeff Bridges, Cameron Monaghan, Jodie Turner-Smith, and more. The film is written by Jesse Wigutow, Jack Thorne, and Steven Lisberger with Joachim Rønning directing Tron: Ares.

Tron: Ares releases in theaters on October 10.
title: Tron: Ares - Official 'The Evolution' Trailer (2025) Jared Leto, Jeff Bridges, Greta Lee

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Agent Launch Trailer for Digimon Story: Time Stranger, a creature-collecting action RPG developed by Media.Vision Inc. Players will travel across time and dimensions to find the cause of strange anomalies to put an end to them once and for all. Digimon Story: Time Stranger is launching on October 3 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Official Agent Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Avatar writer / director James Cameron sat down for an exclusive interview with IGN where he broke down some big reveals from his movie Avatar: Fire and Ash including the mysterious origins of Kiri, how the new movie picks up where Avatar: The Way of Water leaves off, and whether or not we'll definitely be getting Avatar 4 and 5.

#IGN #Avatar
title: James Cameron Reveals Avatar Fire & Ash Details, And Why AI Will Never Write His Scripts

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Friendly Fishing Add-On Reveal Trailer for Minecraft, a creation adventure game developed by Mojang. 

Players can now access the Friendly Fishing Add-On that allows friends to embark on a journey to complete a custom fish encyclopedia. Interface with new fishing mechanics, find treasures under the waves, and explore the open seas. The Friendly Fishing Add-On is available now for Minecraft.

#IGN #Minecraft #Fishing
title: Minecraft - Official Friendly Fishing Add-On Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ghost of Yotei has some pretty intense combat, but luckily, there are a number of skills you can unlock to bring totally new tactics to the fight. This video includes 10 that you should focus on first, with some recommendations for the stealthier players too.

0:00 - Intro
0:23 - Understanding Altars of Reflection 
1:24 - Attacks - Perfect Parry
1:57 - Attacks - Disarm Counter
2:40 - Attacks - Jump Kick
3:31 - Survival - Roll
4:06 - Survival - Perfect Dodge
4:36 - Assassination - Killer's Instinct 
5:05 - Assassination - Chain Assassination 
5:31 - Ranged - Concentration 
6:18 - Katana - Heavenly Slash
6:49 - Katana - Iadō
title: Ghost of Yotei: 10 Best Skills to Get First

author: IGN
description:
Jake Rosser is haunted by PTSD from his days as a K-9 officer and endeavors to lead a peaceful life with his family and retired K-9 companion, Socks. But the tranquility quickly dissolves when a ruthless gang targets them in a brutal attack. 

Determined to protect his loved ones, Jake and his new K-9 partner Argos delve into a violent underbelly of crime where Jake confronts corrupt officials, uncovers a perilous drug trafficking ring, and battles his own inner demons.

A sequel to 2023's Muzzle, the action-thriller stars Aaron Eckhart and Tanya van Graan. Directed by John Stalberg Jr., Muzzle: City of Wolves opens in theaters on November 14, 2025.
title: Muzzle: City of Wolves - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Aaron Eckhart, Tanya van Graan

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Offcial Trailer #3 for Black Phone 2, an upcoming horror film sequel starring Ethan Hawke, Mason Thames, and Madeleine McGraw. Black Phone 2 opens in theaters on October 17, 2025.

Four years ago, 13-year-old Finn killed his abductor and escaped, becoming the sole survivor of The Grabber. But true evil transcends death … and the phone is ringing again. 

Four-time Academy Award nominee Ethan Hawke returns to the most sinister role of his career as The Grabber seeks vengeance on Finn (Mason Thames) from beyond the grave by menacing Finn’s younger sister, Gwen (Madeleine McGraw). 

As Finn, now 17, struggles with life after his captivity, the headstrong 15-year-old Gwen begins receiving calls in her dreams from the black phone and seeing disturbing visions of three boys being stalked at a winter camp known as Alpine Lake. 

Determined to solve the mystery and end the torment for both her and her brother, Gwen persuades Finn to visit the camp during a winter storm. There,
title: Black Phone 2 - Official Trailer #3 (2025) Ethan Hawke, Mason Thames, Madeline McGraw

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, remastered versions of the hit 3D platformers developed by Nintendo. 

Players can explore the galaxy in an all-new way with modern enhancements such as enhanced resolution, improved UI, extra Storybook Chapters, a new Assist Mode, and more for players to enjoy. Nintendo Switch 2 users can support 4K resolution and mouse controls for Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, available now for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Nintendo #SuperMarioGalaxy
title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Over 200 Characters' Anniversary Trailer for Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero, the hit 3D action anime fighter developed by Spike Chunsoft. 

Players can take a look down memory lane to see all 200 characters that have been added since the release of Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero with more characters on the way. Stay tuned for more information on the next DLC characters in January 2026 for Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #DragonBallZ #FightingGames
title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Official 'Over 200 Characters' Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for OBEX, a black-and-white surreal fantasy film distributed by Oscilloscope Laboratories. OBEX is set to release early 2026.

In pre-internet 1987, Conor and his dog Sandy live a life of seclusion, lost in the slow-rendering graphics of early Macs and televisions aglow with late night horror movie marathons. But when he begins playing OBEX, a new and mysterious, state-of-the-art computer game, he finds himself trapped in a low-tech, but high-stakes analog hellscape as the line between reality and game blurs.

OBEX stars Albert Birney, Callie Hernandez, Paisley Isaacs, Frank Mosley, Tyler Davis, and more. The film is directed by Albert Birney and written by Pete Ohs alongside Albert Birney.

OBEX is set to release early 2026.

#IGN #ObexMovie #Sundance2025
title: OBEX - Official Trailer (2025) Albert Birney, Callie Hernandez, Paisley Isaacs

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Resident Evil Survival Unit, an upcoming mobile strategy horror game developed by Aniplex, JoyCity, and Capcom. 

Players can get a look at new gameplay showing off the key characters in the game from the Resident Evil franchise, some moment-to-moment gameplay, and more. Resident Evil Survival Unit is coming soon to iOS and Android.

Pre-register here: https://resu.onelink.me/Rrll/cx9x16tm

Official Website: https://www.residentevil-survivalunit.com

#IGN #ResidentEvil #Horror
title: Resident Evil Survival Unit - Official Gameplay Trailer | TGS 2025

author: IGN
description: The Armor of the Undying is one of the strongest early-game sets in Ghost of Yotei, giving you extended Perfect Parry and Dodge windows, health restoration on stagger, and boosted stagger damage when weapon-aligned. In this guide, we’ll walk you through how to start the Undying Samurai quest, where to find all four chimes, and how to defeat the Undying Samurai himself to claim this powerful armor.
title: Ghost of Yotei: How to Get the Armor of the Undying (Best Early Game Armor)

author: IGN
description:
Whilst playing through Ghost of Yotei's tale of revenge and grief, we began to notice some similarities with other PlayStation first party games like The Last of Us Part 2, God of War Ragnarok and Death Stranding 2. 

A lot of these games tell very similar stories, so that begs the question is it about time PS5 exclusives got some new ideas?

#IGN #PS5 #GhostOfYotei
title: I’m Getting Bored of Every PlayStation Game Telling the Same Story

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Overview Trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, a third-person creature-collecting RPG developed by Game Freak. 

Players can get the rundown on what's in store in the latest Pokemon adventure, from narrative details, activities around Lumiose City, combat system, and more. Pokemon Legends: Z-A is launching on October 16 for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Pokemon #NintendoSwitch2
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: It's been a long time since Disney took a flyer on the sci fi tale of video game maverick Kevin Flynn and his adventure in a literal computer. Tron went from a near flop to cult classic and eventually made it to a legitimate pop culture icon. Almost 30 years later, we got a system upgrade with Tron: Legacy, introducing improved graphics and updated concepts. And, in the year of our Creator 2025, Tron becomes a trilogy with Ares. Since you don’t have time to watch four hours of Tron before the next installment, we went ahead and took care of that for you. It’s recap time.
title: Tron Franchise Recap

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'KPop Demon Hunters' Gameplay Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale game developed by Epic Games. 

Players can now fight back against demons in the Demon Rush Limited-Time Event, fitted with new items and consumables alongside new KPop Demon Hunter skins in the Item Shop. The KPop Demon Hunters Demon Rush Limited-Time Event is available now in Fortnite.

#IGN #Fortnite #KPopDemonHunters
title: Fortnite - Official 'KPop Demon Hunters' Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Starfinder: Afterlight is a new "science-fantasy" turn-based RPG due to launch into Early Access on PC in 2026. In a quest to save the universe from total destruction, you'll build your own character and lead the crew of a vanished captain. Those companions will play a big part in this RPG, which is based on the Starfinder tabletop game's Second Edition rules. Their Kickstarter campaign launches on October 7. Check out their Kickstarter page for more: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/epictellers/starfinder-afterlight
title: Starfinder: Afterlight – Official Kickstarter Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this Hollow Knight Silksong boss fight, we go through the optional Voltvyrm boss fight in Voltnest inside Memorium. It's an inconsequential and brief fight if you use tools with the Pollip Pouch. Stay to the edges of the arena when you can and just get your hits in between its attacks.

Crest: Hunter
Throwable: Cogfly
Ability: Silkspear
Tools: Longclaw, Pollip Pouch, Pimpillo, Compass, Magnetite Brooch

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Voltvyrm (Voltnest)
